title: Ep84: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Massacre at La Paradis
itunes:title: Ep84: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Massacre at La Paradis
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary explore one of the darkest chapters in the history of the RNR - the massacre of nearly 100 troops by the SS in the town of La Paradis. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great...
description:
Pete and Gary explore one of the darkest chapters in the history of the RNR - the massacre of nearly 100 troops by the SS in the town of La Paradis.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
